1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: While on a mission to the planet Slugulon, Space Girl's ship is attacked. As she plummets towards the planet's surface, she deals with certain relationship issues brought up by her jealous and uncooperative ship's AI.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: After crash landing on the planet Slugulon, Space Girl faces the villainous Dr. Brain and his killer squiddly. While threatening the Slugulon's with the conquest of their world, Dr. Brain has some embarrassing performance issues with the missile he intends to do that with.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: After climbing aboard Dr. Brain's missile, Space Girl discovers that the only way to disarm it and save the planet Slugulon is to kill a cute, cuddly creature attached to the controls. Space Girl agonizes over the decision of whether to kill the creature to save the far more disgusting residents of the planet Slugulon or to allow the residents of the planet Slugulon to die so that the creature may live.

locations: New York City, New York, USA::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: Episode 1 Space Girl has to deal with her uncooperative ship's AI as she is shot down over the planet Slugulon. Episode 2 Space Girl must stop the evil Dr. Brain's missile that threatens to destroy the planet Slugulon. Episode 3 Space Girl agonizes over the decision whether or not to kill a cute, cuddly creature required to disarm the missile that threatens to destroy the far more disgusting residents of the planet Slugulon.
imdb.title: Space Girl
plot: The various adventures of _Space Girl_ (qv), an outer space heroine who deals with aliens, mad scientists, and other space things.::Mario Pacheco
